text:
As I was looking at your script I clocked the $ and in the solved version you had it set to jQuery instead. I'd lean more towards that change being the reason it worked as opposed to the quotes because it doesn't look to me like they would clash :man-shrugging:

Our website has a tendency to moan and fail to run the script if it is set with $ instead of jQuery. Tempermental things! :disappointed:

Where can I find the specific functions the HubSpot chat bot runs when it initiates its conversion?

To track our previous livechat provider, I setup a listener + push event to GTM so that we could track conversions for new live chats. But, I can't seem to find where the HubSpot chat functions are to alter my code to accomodate HubSpot instead... :thinking_face:
